New Records: Charlie Blackmon hit his NL-leading 45th double to tie the game
Key Match Events: The Rockies scored five runs with two outs in the eighth inning to come back and win the game 10-8
Charlie Blackmon hit a two-run home run in the 2nd inning
The Rockies had a two-out, five-run rally in the eighth inning
Ryan McMahon and Michael Toglia followed with doubles of their own to give Colorado its first lead of the day
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockies need to take two of three from the Dodgers this weekend to avoid 100 losses
Post-Match Reflections: Charlie Blackmon will be in the lineup for the season's final three games this weekend
The team is fixated on avoiding their second straight 100-loss season
Ryan McMahon said that avoiding 100 losses is on the forefront of everybody's mind
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlie Blackmon is on a September heater, slashing.295/.353/.557 with five doubles, one triple and three homers this month
The Rockies' Charlie Blackmon is retiring at the end of the season
